name: T-Minus (michaelaranda)
description:
A flingy space adventure that sends you deeper and deeper into space!

Controls

Click, drag, and release your mouse to launch your ship into the unknown depths of space.

Patches

  • April 29, 2021 — Fixes some visual elements not appearing on some platforms

Known Bugs

  • The ship will occasionally fail to properly land on a planet.
  • Launching off a planet will occasionally yield only a tiny amount of thrust.

 Credits

**Juliestrator** — Art and Programming

**Steve McStevenson** — Programming

**Michael Aranda** — Music, Sounds, and Programming

Special thanks to Rene Aranda and SoonRaccoon for contributing ideas to the development process!
